page.title: 03HOUSING IN DURSLEY
page.content: One of the largest council housing estates in the District is the Highfields estate. The older properties were built around 1922 and the estate covers an area of approxamatly 50 acres. This includes Dursley Primary School and it's playing fields. The estate consists of 260 properties ,of which 30% have been sold.There are 232 2 and 3 bedroomed houses,the majority of them being 3 bedroomed.There are also 18 one bedroomed houses and units of one or two bedroomed flats.Most of the houses are semi-detached. None of the buildings were built specifically for elderly people,but there are two warden-controlled units at Vizard House and Cambridge House.
